titleStmt.title: A discourse of the duties on merchandize, more particularly that on sugars occasionally offer'd in answer to a pamphlet intituled The groans of the plantations, &c., exposing the weakness of the said pamphlet ... also shewing how the last imposition on sugars did truly affect that trade ... / by a merchant.
titleStmt.author: Merchant.

notesStmt.note: Answer to Edward Littleton's The groans of the plantations.
